sentences.sContent: In some angiosperm the seeds are equipped with gossamer wings, like the dandelion and milkweed seeds.
sentences.sContent_eng: In some angiosperm the seeds are equipped with gossamer wings, like the dandelion and milkweed seeds.
sentences.sCn: 有些被子植物的种子有蛛丝般的翅膀，例如蒲公英和乳草属植物的种子。

sentences.sContent: “Early steps of angiosperm-pollinator coevolution.” Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences USA 105: 240-245.
sentences.sContent_eng: “Early steps of angiosperm-pollinator coevolution.” Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences USA 105: 240-245.
sentences.sCn: 《被子植物和花粉传播者共同进化的早期阶段》——美国国家科学院论文集105: 240-245.

sentences.sContent: “The angiosperm radiation revisited, an ecological explanation for Darwin’s abominable mystery.” Ecology Letters 12: 865-872.
sentences.sContent_eng: “The angiosperm radiation revisited, an ecological explanation for Darwin’s abominable mystery.” Ecology Letters 12: 865-872.
sentences.sCn: 其中Berendse, F. and Scheffer, M. 2009年对相关假设作了一个精巧的摘编，见《重温被子植物的发散，针对达尔文糟糕透顶的神秘轮生态学解析》——生态学通讯12: 865-872.
